comments.body: There is at least the odd case:  ```tree->Branch("brname","leafname/I");``` where we probably want to allow plotting with either ```brname``` or ```brname.leafname```
Do you mean a branch with an individual leaf? Should we really want to support that in the high level interface?

Well ... I was speculating on the possible source of the problem that was mentioned.
In addition, yes I think we ought to let the user write either ```brname``` or ```brname.leafname``` (and I thought it was already the case in TDF ... it is the case in TTree::Draw).
